item.title: Use Your Technical Savvy To Save Elephants
item.description: The African forest elephant, a critically endangered species, faces imminent extinction due to illegal poaching. Their value extends beyond ivory, making their preservation crucial for both nature and humanity. While conservation efforts are crucial, you possess valuable skills that can contribute to their survival: technological expertise and innovative thinking. The challenge lies in locating and monitoring the remaining elephants, a task made difficult by their dwindling numbers and remote habitat within dense forests.
